title: "What Is Hypnotic Communication and How Can It Utilize the Power of Senses and Imagination?"
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens, the text introduces the technique of hypnotic communication based on Enneagram. The concept is explained by looking at advertising, where creating a new and imaginative image captures people's attention. The text emphasizes the importance of activating the unconscious mind, using sensory systems, and creating a clear mental picture while appealing to all senses. The latter part of the text defines nine types of people to communicate with and suggests using linguistic approaches that match their compulsions. The Enneagram technique can be used to push individuals in a new direction to influence their behavior subtly.
content: Abbiamo infatti sviluppato un'analisi tipologica che ci permette di individuare nove tipi di persone con ciascuna delle quali potremo adottare un approccio linguistico differente. In pratica in questo caso la tecnica consiste nbell'appoggiarsi sulle "compulsioni" dei vari tipi per spingerli in una nuova direzione. Il tipo uno è chiamato il perfezionista. Linguisticamente lo convinceremo con parole del tipo "giusto", "perfetto". Come strategia mentale vede ed analizza. Lo coinvolgeremo quindi con espressiono del tipo "se guardi ed analizzi la situazione...". Il tipo due è chiamato l'altruista.
last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the different personality types is essential to effective communication. By utilizing the typological analysis we have developed, we can identify nine different types of people, each requiring a unique linguistic approach. By understanding their compulsions, we can tailor our language to guide them in a new direction. Whether speaking to a perfectionist or an altruist, we can choose the right words to connect with each individual at a deeper level, improve understanding and foster genuine connections.
